text: Empathy is a crucial aspect of human behavior, particularly in the context of the global workplace and the considerations surrounding employee stakeholders. Human resources and managerial oversight play a significant role in navigating the complexities of human emotions and interactions within business organizations. Business ethics, along with risk management practices, are intrinsic to workplace dynamics. The rise of AI-reliant business models necessitates a thorough examination of the ethical implications of AI on employees. This paper delves into the ethical considerations of AI's impact on business-employee relations, emphasizing the importance of empathy in understanding human intentions within the workplace.
